name: ServiceNow
description: This plugin supports performing 'Share application data' action to 'User Administration > Companies' page of the ServiceNow platform. This plugin does not support fetching data from the ServiceNow platform.

configuration.label: Username
configuration.description: Username of your ServiceNow instance. Username can be created from 'System Security > Users and Groups > Users' page of the ServiceNow instance.

configuration.label: Password
configuration.description: Password of your ServiceNow instance. Password for the username can be set from 'System Security > Users and Groups > Users > Select User > Set Password' page of the ServiceNow instance.
